name: BioHackAcademy_Tehran
body:
This page is dedicated to documentation of [2nd Bio-HAck Academy](https://waag.org/en/project/biohack-academy-biofactory) in Tehran Held at [CARBON Ideas Studio|FabLab](http://carbonstudio.ir), started from 15th September 2015. This page would be managed by [AliMirakbari](https://ir.linkedin.com/pub/ali-mirakbari/25/764/a09), the Local coordinator/Tutor of program.This is an educationl program of Waag Society Amsterdam; held for the first time in the Spring of 2015. The course is fully open source and distributed through partner labs around the globe. October, 16, 2015: [Google Drive folder](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B5hQVp8S32n-XzBGUTdNb21uYWs) Shared files and photos during course. use your own dedicated sub-folder. ### Need help? Wants to know more? Check out [Parent page](http://biohackacademy.github.io/bha2/) or send emails to amirali@carbonstudio.ir ![License](https://i.creativecommons.org/l/by-nc/4.0/88x31.png)
BHA2 Academy Tehran is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
